title: Bug 23787 - [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: During the integration build on 09/17, it was observed that the Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog is using text fields instead of labels. This looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: The Project Properties Info page is using text fields instead of labels.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should use labels instead of text fields. The labels should be read-only, so that users can't modify the values. Additionally, the labels should support selecting and copying the values.
SR:
1. Open the Properties dialog.
2. Navigate to the Project Properties Info page.
3. Check the type of UI component used for displaying the properties.
4. Verify that text fields are used instead of labels.
